review: This worked for a week and then I got a blue screen saying "HDCP unauthorised. content disabled". I tried all  the solutions provided on the forum but none worked. Additionally none of the 4 HDMI ports on my TV work now. Its a Westinghouse 42" which  is now useless.  No amount of hard resetting fixed  the TV which is now  bricked. Check out this thread before you buy. http://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/forums/ref=cs_hc_g_tv?ie=UTF8&forumID;=Fx1SKFFP8U1B6N5&cdThread;=Tx1A10FFQXCSZ2MI recommend you don't. I'm returning the  Firestick  and have bought a  Vizio  49" TV at Costco for $70 less than the Amazon price.

review: While I was really excited to originally get this device it doesn't do what I thought it could. I brought it under the assumption(fault on my part) that I could get the TWC TV app on this. Not only can't I its not even compatible with the FireTV. So unfortunately I will be returning it because for me that is a deal breaker. I have Roku Streamers in all rooms because I don't pay the fees for the Set Top boxes. Less money out of pocket for me. I will be returning it and getting Roku Streaming sticks instead, sorry Amazon I tried it just didn't meet MY expectations.
